item.title: Wildfires Quickly Spread Across Texas and Oklahoma
item.description: Emergency crews in both states were scrambling to keep up with all the blazes popping up across the map.

item.title: ‘On the Tightrope’: Britain Tries to Bridge a Widening Trans-Atlantic Gap
item.description: Five years after Brexit, Prime Minister Keir Starmer’s intense diplomacy on Ukraine has put Britain back in a familiar role on the global stage.

item.title: Draft List for New Travel Ban Proposes Trump Target 43 Countries
item.description: A draft circulating inside the administration lists three tiers of countries whose citizens may face restrictions on entering the United States.
